title: MySQLORDER BYKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLORDER BYKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
The MySQL ORDER BY Keyword
The
ORDER BY
keyword is used to sort the result-set in ascending or 
descending order.
The
ORDER BY
keyword sorts the records in ascending order by default. To sort the records in descending order, use the
DESC
keyword.
ORDER BY Syntax
SELECT
column1
,
column2, ...
FROM
table_name
ORDER BY
column1, column2, ...
ASC|DESC;
Demo Database
Below is a selection from the "Customers" table in the Northwind sample database:

ORDER BY Example
The following SQL statement selects all customers from the "Customers" table, 
sorted by the "Country" column:
Example
SELECT * FROM Customers
ORDER BY Country;

ORDER BY DESC Example
The following SQL statement selects all customers from the "Customers" table, 
sorted DESCENDING by the "Country" column:
Example
SELECT * FROM Customers
ORDER BY Country DESC;

ORDER BY Several Columns Example
The following SQL statement selects all customers from the "Customers" table, 
sorted by the "Country" and the "CustomerName" column. This means that it orders 
by Country, but if some rows have the same Country, it orders them by 
CustomerName:
Example
SELECT * FROM Customers
ORDER BY Country, CustomerName;

ORDER BY Several Columns Example 2
The following SQL statement selects all customers from the "Customers" table, 
sorted ascending by the "Country" and descending by the "CustomerName" column:
Example
SELECT * FROM Customers
ORDER BY Country ASC, CustomerName DESC;

★
+1

content_sections.code:

column1
,
column2, ...

table_name
ORDER BY

ASC|DESC;

ORDER BY Country;

content_sections.code:
SELECT * FROM Customers
ORDER BY Country DESC;

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:
SELECT * FROM Customers
ORDER BY Country, CustomerName;

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:
SELECT * FROM Customers
ORDER BY Country ASC, CustomerName DESC;

summary: This tutorial covers MySQLORDER BYKeyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use MySQLORDER BYKeyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of MySQLORDER BYKeyword and how to apply it in your projects.
